Jimmy Carter Secretary of State Colin Powell says he is voting for Barack Obama . He has both style and substance. I think he is a transformational figure, Colin Powell said on NBC's`` Meet the Press.''`` Barack Obama displayed a steadiness. Showed intellectual vigor. `` Egypt recognises and appreciates the care and effort undertaken by the government of Germany to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti,'' Zahi Hawass said in a statement. But he asked that this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people.
